name: Fefes-Blog Solarized-Light Interactive
description:
Apply the Solarized-Light Theme to Fefes Blog

If you don't know what this means, go to http://ethanschoonover.com/solarized and read.
Its a theme, thats not supposed to be funky and happy, but to be pleasent to your Eyes for a long time ...
additional_info:
This style helps me, to skim over the page - It does not necessarily do this for you.
I found, it helped me, to use the highlighting-hover effect.

You're free to change the "busy"-parts.
